means: 使成杂色，使有斑点( mottle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He studied waters from five areas where mottling was endemic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他研究有地方性牙病的五个地区的水.

sentence.Network_en: The city is a matrix mottling on region scenery.
sentence.Network_cn: 城市是区域山水基质上的一个斑块.

sentence.Network_en: The funduscopic examination showed diffuse mottling of the retinal pigmented epithelium.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼底镜检显示视网膜色素上皮斑驳化.
